GSD.product_version: versions from v5.9 to before v5.10.140
GSD.description:
perf/x86/lbr: Enable the branch type for the Arch LBR by default

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.140 by commit 090f0ac167a04d5cbc22718655f0c733a3b99775, it was introduced in version v5.9 by commit 47125db27e47e9d44c878bf8925aa057824bb0d5. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: perf/x86/lbr: Enable the branch type for the Arch LBR by default
OSV.details:
perf/x86/lbr: Enable the branch type for the Arch LBR by default

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.140 by commit 090f0ac167a04d5cbc22718655f0c733a3b99775, it was introduced in version v5.9 by commit 47125db27e47e9d44c878bf8925aa057824bb0d5. For more details please see the references link.
